property.value: Response: After an opponent's character is killed, its controller discards the top X cards of his or her deck. X is that character's STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen or House Stark only. Challenges: Choose a character with a military and an intrigue icon that is attacking alone. For the duration of the challenge, that character gains stealth. If you win the challenge, instead of the normal claim effects, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Challenges: Kneel 1 influence to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell Only. Any phase: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Noble character to choose a character. Return that character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel 1 influence to return a Targaryen character from your dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Any phase: Kneel 4 influence or kneel 2 Lannister Noble characters to kneel each character without an intrigue icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose an attacking or defending War character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets +3 STR. After the challenge resolves, choose and kill another participating character with lower STR, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Any phase: Discard X power from your House to put into play from your hand a character with printed cost X or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel 2 influence to save a Greyjoy character from being killed. Then, choose and kill a character with lower STR, if able.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Plot: Kneel 2 influence to reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 2 influence or kneel a Learned character to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not count its STR during challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Plot: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Noble character to reveal the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck. Put one of those cards into his or her dead pile, then put the rest on the bottom of his or her deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge, kneel one of your Lannister characters to choose and kill a participating character controlled by the winning opponent. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Response: Cancel a response effect just played or triggered.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Response: After you win a challenge as defender, choose and kill an attacking character (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel 6 influence to put the top 5 cards of your deck into play, facedown, each as a character named 'Recruit.' It has the Night's Watch trait, 1 STR, a military icon, and the no attachments keyword.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Response: Cancel a triggered effect unless its controller kneels 1 influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon or House Greyjoy only. Challenges: Choose a character with an intrigue and a power icon that is attacking alone. For the duration of the challenge, that character gains stealth. If you win the challenge, instead of the normal claim effects, look at the losing opponent's hand and choose and discard a card from this player's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a power challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose a non-unique character controlled by the losing opponent. Take control of that character. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Choose a Holy character. Until the end of the phase, that character is immune to triggered effects and does not kneel to defend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Cancel the effects of an event if one of your Stark characters is chosen as the only target.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. Any phase: Kneel 1 influence or kneel a Noble character to choose and discard from play up to 2 attachments (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Noble character to search your deck for up to 2 Limited locations with printed cost 2 or lower and put them into play. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Reveal and discard the top 5 cards of your deck. If one of those cards is a Dragon character, put it into play and discard from play all other non-Dragon characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Until the end of the phase, unique Stark characters cannot be killed.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister or House Targaryen only. Challenges: Choose a character with an intrigue and a power icon that is attacking alone. For the duration of the challenge, that character gains renown. If you win the challenge, instead of the normal claim effects, look at the losing opponent's hand and choose and discard a card from this player's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell or House Lannister only. Challenges: Choose a character with a military and an intrigue icon that is attacking alone. For the duration of the challenge, that character gains +2 STR. If you win the challenge, instead of the normal claim effects, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an intrigue challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, the losing opponent cannot attack or defend during that challenge type. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Learned character to reveal the top 3 cards of your deck, then put them into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Noble character to choose an opponent. Discard from play all attachments that opponent controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Lower the cost of the next Targaryen card you play this phase by 1 (lower the cost to 0 instead if it is a Targaryen attachment).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Play after a Targaryen character has been killed. Draw 2 cards, then draw an additional card for each attachment on that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Any phase: Choose and kneel a non-Noble character. Then, that character claims 1 power.

card.name: All the Gold in Casterly Rock

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Each Lannister location you control adds +1 to your income.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the standing phase, discard from play all kneeling, non-unique, non-Limited characters and locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, if there are 1 or fewer Kingdom cards in your used pile, discard your hand, then put the top 5 cards of your deck into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, kneel all non-limited locations.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Non-Targaryen characters get -1 STR while attacking or defending.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Opponents cannot play events.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, if there are 1 or fewer Kingdom cards in your used pile, search your deck for a character with printed cost 3 or lower and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cancel the 'when revealed' text of each opponent's plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Lower the cost of the first Stark character you play during the marshalling phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. You claim an additional power for unopposed challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you lose initiative, discard your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. You may play characters in your dead pile as if they were in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may have up to 2 copies of The Power of Arms in your plot deck. War characters you control get +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may have up to 2 copies of The Power of Blood in your plot deck. Noble characters cannot be killed.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may have up to 2 copies of The Power of Faith in your plot deck. Holy characters you control gain a military icon and do not kneel to attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may have up to 2 copies of The Power of Knowledge in your plot deck. Characters with the Learned Crest gain the War, Holy, and Noble Crests.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, the opponent to your left chooses a Lord and Lady character, if able. Then, you must choose and kill one of those characters. The other claims 2 power.

card.name: The Things I Do for Love

property.name: Text
property.value: After an opponent triggers an effect, raise the Claim Value of The Things I Do for Love by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ignore all gold penalties.

property.name: Text
property.value: An opponent must discard one power from his or her House or kneel 1 influence in order to initiate each military, intrigue, or power challenge against you.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each opponent may return his or her revealed plot card to his or her plot deck and reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Kindom. When revealed, if you have 1 or fewer Kingdom plots in your used pile, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters you control do not kneel to attack or defend during intrigue challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Characters without an intrigue icon get -1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Kingdom. Characters you control get +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters you control do not kneel to attack or defend during military challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat all characters in play as though their text boxes were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Add +2 to your total STR for each challenge in which you have at least 1 participating character.
